raw_comment: I notice immediately that the states closest to the equator tend to experience their first leaf before the more northern territories.  This is a combination of generally warm weather, the new spring season, and how cold the weather in each respective territory remains throughout the early spring.  I wonder if global warming has a significant effect on how quickly or slowly the leafs appear on the trees, and further, flowers or fruits on the trees.  A title for this  graph could be "May Flowers: An Evolution of Spring."
ace_sentences: States that are closest to the equator experience their first leaf earlier than more northern territories.
This tendency is a combination of generally warm weather.
This tendency is a combination of the spring season.
This tendency is a combination of how cold the weather in each territory remains during early spring.
I wonder whether global warming has a significant effect on how quickly leaves appear on trees.
I wonder whether global warming has a significant effect on how slowly leaves appear on trees.
I wonder whether global warming has a significant effect on how quickly flowers appear on trees.
I wonder whether global warming has a significant effect on how slowly flowers appear on trees.
I wonder whether global warming has a significant effect on how quickly fruits appear on trees.
I wonder whether global warming has a significant effect on how slowly fruits appear on trees.
A title for this graph could be "May Flowers: An Evolution of Spring".
